title: Dread Iron Dagger
content:
Dread Iron Dagger Rare 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing Dread Iron Ambush: While its wielder is hidden, this weapon deals an extra 1~6 Necrotic damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A web of veins runs the length of the blade - it has become a slender iron mortuary for all the innocents it has tasted. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 95

Dread Iron Dagger

Dread Iron Ambush: While its wielder is hidden, this weapon deals an extra 1~6 Necrotic damage.
